description: Using data from project sea level rise by 2050 and spatially distributed storm surges for Trinidad and Tobago from the IDB project Economics of Climate Change Adaptation the zone of immediate impact was identified and set at the 5m contour.
keywords: features, ICZM, Trinidad and Tobago, zone_t1_trinidad, Trinidad and Tobago
name: TV_TTO_Trinidad_ICZM_terrestrial_zone_T1_area_of_immediate_impact_2014_25000
